name: Clockwork
description: php dev tools integrated to your browser

scripts.build-chrome: vue-cli-service build && rm -rf dist/chrome && mv build dist/chrome && cp -R platforms/chrome/* dist/chrome/
scripts.build-chrome-dev: vue-cli-service build --mode=development && rm -rf dist/chrome && mv build dist/chrome && cp -R platforms/chrome/* dist/chrome/
scripts.build-web: vue-cli-service build && rm -rf dist/web && mv build dist/web
scripts.build-web-dev: vue-cli-service build --mode=development && rm -rf dist/web && mv build dist/web
